Title: Requires landlords to include voter registration update forms in lease signature packages
Summary: Requires that every lease signature package provided to a tenant by a landlord or the landlord's agent shall include a New York State Voter Registration Form for each tenant over the age of eighteen years and information directing the tenant or tenants to the board of elections website.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring landlords to include voter registration update forms in lease signature packages
